job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a Copywriter/Prompt Engineer, you know exactly how to create (and supervise the creation of) high-quality copy. You accomplish this by considering a myriad of factors: the content strategy, channel specifications, the customer journey, best practices, data, tone of voice, and an outside-in approach. Sounds like a lot of variables, but you are adept at performance-based, audience-first content creation. You've honed this skill over years of experience.

   For the past few months, you've been mastering the art of prompt engineering. Not only are you well-versed with the current generative AI tools and features, but you also stay abreast of new innovations. You often ponder: How can we implement novelties in our workflows? For what kind of projects can we suggest AI solutions to our clients? How much time can we save using a specific tool? You are one of the first to pitch ideas.

   We are a young company where the brightest minds work every day on a wide range of clients, such as Beiersdorf, Canva, and smart. We prefer to have the most talented experts on board, but we are also looking for the perfect DEPT®-fit. Someone who is not afraid to learn, inspire, and strive for a better world. Someone who looks ahead, dares to take the stage, and toasts to a successful week with us on Friday afternoon.

   For this role, we're looking for someone who speaks and writes Dutch on a native level.
job_details.full_text:
Copywriter/Prompt Engineer

As a Copywriter/Prompt Engineer, you know exactly how to create (and supervise the creation of) high-quality copy. You accomplish this by considering a myriad of factors: the content strategy, channel specifications, the customer journey, best practices, data, tone of voice, and an outside-in approach. Sounds like a lot of variables, but you are adept at performance-based, audience-first content creation. You've honed this skill over years of experience.

   For the past few months, you've been mastering the art of prompt engineering. Not only are you well-versed with the current generative AI tools and features, but you also stay abreast of new innovations. You often ponder: How can we implement novelties in our workflows? For what kind of projects can we suggest AI solutions to our clients? How much time can we save using a specific tool? You are one of the first to pitch ideas.

   We are a young company where the brightest minds work every day on a wide range of clients, such as Beiersdorf, Canva, and smart. We prefer to have the most talented experts on board, but we are also looking for the perfect DEPT®-fit. Someone who is not afraid to learn, inspire, and strive for a better world. Someone who looks ahead, dares to take the stage, and toasts to a successful week with us on Friday afternoon.

   For this role, we're looking for someone who speaks and writes Dutch on a native level.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on copywriting and prompt engineering for content creation, rather than the development, fine-tuning, or deployment of AI models. While it mentions generative AI tools, it lacks the technical depth required for an ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer role.

phrases: How can we implement novelties in our workflows?
For what kind of projects can we suggest AI solutions to our clients?
How much time can we save using a specific tool?
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate an understanding of business goals, audience needs, and how to align content creation with strategic objectives. The questions posed also reflect a business-oriented approach to AI implementation.

phrases: mastering the art of prompt engineering
current generative AI tools and features
job_tasks.justification: While not deep model development, prompt engineering is a form of adapting and utilizing generative models for specific outputs, fitting the broader definition of 'adapting' models.
The mention of implementing novelties and suggesting AI solutions implies integrating AI into existing workflows or applications, which touches upon software development aspects.

technologies.justification: Directly refers to the category of models used in generative AI.

phrases: create (and supervise the creation of) high-quality copy
translate complex technical concepts for diverse audiences
soft_skills.justification: The role involves creating and supervising copy, implying communication of requirements and vision. The company culture emphasizes inspiring others.
Explicitly states the need to keep up with new developments and a willingness to learn.

phrases: adept at performance-based, audience-first content creation
How can we implement novelties in our workflows?
For what kind of projects can we suggest AI solutions to our clients?
How much time can we save using a specific tool?
soft_skills.justification: Demonstrates an ability to analyze factors for content creation and a pragmatic approach to identifying AI solutions for efficiency and client benefit.

phrases: You are one of the first to pitch ideas
soft_skills.justification: Highlights a proactive and initiative-taking approach to suggesting new ideas and taking a leading role.
